meta.name: Transform RSS Feeds into Blog Articles with GPT-4, Human Review & Google Docs

name: Generate blog articles from RSS feeds with AI review

parameters.content:
## üì∞ RSS to Blog Article Generator with Human Approval

### What This Workflow Does
Automatically converts RSS feed articles into detailed blog posts using AI, sends them for human review, and publishes approved articles to Google Docs with Slack notifications.

### How It Works
1. **Schedule Trigger** - Runs every 6 hours to check for new articles
2. **RSS Feed** - Fetches latest articles from your RSS source
3. **Data Processing** - Extracts key information (title, keywords, description)
4. **AI Generation** - Creates detailed blog post using GPT-4
5. **Human Review** - Sends article to reviewer via gotoHuman
6. **Approval Check** - Routes approved/rejected articles
7. **Google Docs** - Creates document with approved content
8. **Slack Notification** - Alerts team of published article

### Setup Requirements
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4 access)
- Google Docs account
- gotoHuman account (for human-in-the-loop approval)
- Slack workspace (for notifications)
- RSS feed URL

### Customization
- Change RSS feed URL in "RSS Read" node
- Adjust article length, tone, and keywords in "Format RSS Data" node
- Modify AI prompt in "Generate Article with AI" node
- Configure approval template in gotoHuman node
- Set schedule frequency in "Schedule Trigger" node

### Target Users
Content teams, bloggers, news sites, marketing agencies who want to automate content creation while maintaining quality control.

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Scheduled Trigger
Runs workflow every 6 hours to check for new RSS articles. Adjust the interval based on your content needs.

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Fetch RSS Feed
Reads articles from your RSS feed. Replace the URL with your own RSS feed source.

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ Process Data
Extracts title, keywords, and description from RSS feed. Formats data for AI processing.

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ AI Article Generation
Uses OpenAI to generate a detailed, structured blog article based on RSS content.

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ Format Article Data
Structures the AI-generated content with title, body, metadata, and word count.

### 6Ô∏è‚É£ Human Review Request
Sends article to designated reviewer via gotoHuman. Waits for approval/rejection.

### 7Ô∏è‚É£ Approval Check
Routes workflow based on review decision. Approved articles proceed to publishing.

### 8Ô∏è‚É£ Publish to Google Docs
Creates new Google Doc with article title and content, including metadata.

### 9Ô∏è‚É£ Team Notification
Sends formatted message to Slack with article details and approval information.

parameters.text:
=You are a professional content writer. Based on the following news article, create a detailed and engaging blog post.

„ÄêSource Article„Äë
Title: {{ $json.original_title }}
Summary: {{ $json.original_description }}
Source URL: {{ $json.original_url }}

„ÄêWriting Requirements„Äë
- Topic: {{ $json.topic }}
- Keywords: {{ $json.keywords }}
- Target length: {{ $json.target_length }}
- Tone: {{ $json.tone }}

„ÄêArticle Structure„Äë
Please create the article with the following structure:

# Compelling Title (specific and engaging)

## Introduction (200 words)
- Background of this news
- Why it matters

## Detailed Analysis
### Point 1: Overview
- What happened

### Point 2: Impact
- What are the implications

### Point 3: Future Outlook
- What's next

## Summary (150 words)
- Key takeaways

---
Meta Description (120 characters max)

options.systemMessage: You are a professional content writer who creates valuable, detailed articles based on news sources.
